title: Executive Order 6176-Allowance to Rural Carriers for Equipment Maintenance
content: In accordance with the provisions of Section 9 of the Independent Offices Appropriation Act, 1934, the amount to be paid to carriers in the Rural Mail Delivery Service for equipment maintenance is fixed, for the period from July 1 to September 30, 1933, at 1.176 cents per mile per day for each mile or major fraction of a mile scheduled.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6176-Allowance to Rural Carriers for Equipment Maintenance Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361995
